thread.title: 9 Slip-Ons For The Girl Who Doesn’t Like Wearing Heels
thread.title_full: 9 Slip-Ons For The Girl Who Doesn’t Like Wearing Heels

title: 9 Slip-Ons For The Girl Who Doesn’t Like Wearing Heels
text:
facebook 
Now that we’re beyond struggling with our feet inside unyielding boots, it’s about time we slipped into something far more liberating… maybe. Something that we fondly call slip-ons? 
Slip-ons, by the virtue of their name, have enough street-cred to last you all of spring. For those of us who identify themselves as princesses, but on the high street, an everlasting pair should be our fix for the season. We picked out nine pairs that should do the job, without tripping you over. 1. Glitter strap is the kind of glam you should get onboard with.
